content: आलापः {@--1@} Talking, speaking to, speech, conversation; अये दक्षिणेन वृक्षवाटिकामालाप इव श्रूयते <ls>Ś. 1</ls>; प्रवसनालाप <ls>Amaru. 97</ls>; ललितालापे <ls>Śrut. 36.</ls> {@--2@} Narration, mention. {@--3@} The seven notes in music (<ab>Mar.</ab> सा, रि, ग, म, प, ध, नि). {@--4@} Statement of a question in an arithmetical or algebraical sum. {@--5@} A question.
